mapper.select: select * from rcm_pre_info p where 1 = 1 and wf_state in (${wf_state}) and stage in (${stage})

select * from rcm_v_deptreport_detail_0706 d where d.isdealed = '${isDealed}' and d.type = '${type}' and d.userid = '${userId}'
and d.PROJECTNAME like '%${projectName}%'
mapper.update: update rcm_pre_info set FIXEDGROUPPERSONIDS = #{fixedGroupIds} where businessid=#{businessId}
mapper.select: select * from ( select ( '/'||i.businessid||'@'|| (select a.proc_def_id_ from act_hi_procinst a where a.proc_inst_id_ = hp.procinstid)||'@'||hp.procinstid||'@@' ) oldUrl, i.*, (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE=i.pertainareaid) pertainareaName , (select o.NAME from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = i.reportingunit_id) reportingunitName , (select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.uuid=i.createby) investmentName, (select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.uuid=i.reviewpersonid) reviewpersonName from rcm_pre_info i ,(select p.business_key_,MAX(p.proc_inst_id_) procinstid from act_hi_procinst p where p.proc_def_id_ in ( select id_ from act_re_procdef pf where pf.key_ in ('preAssessment','preReview') ) group by p.business_key_ ) hp where i.businessid = hp.business_key_ (+) ) ta where 1 = 1 and ta.createby = #{createBy} and ta.pertainareaName like '%${projectUnitName}%' and ta.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and ta.wf_state in (${wf_state}) and ta.wf_state = '0' and ta.pertainAreaId = #{areaId} and ta.servicetype_id = #{serviceTypeId} and ta.stage in (${stages}) order by ta.create_date desc

select * from ( select ( '/'||i.businessid||'@'|| (select a.proc_def_id_ from act_hi_procinst a where a.proc_inst_id_ = hp.procinstid)||'@'||hp.procinstid||'@@' ) oldUrl, i.*, (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE=i.pertainareaid) pertainareaName , (select o.NAME from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = i.reportingunit_id) reportingunitName , (select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.uuid=i.createby) investmentName, (select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.uuid=i.reviewpersonid) reviewpersonName , ( select d.item_name from sys_dictionary_item d where d.item_code = i.servicetype_id) setviceTypeName from rcm_pre_info i ,(select p.business_key_,MAX(p.proc_inst_id_) procinstid from act_hi_procinst p where p.proc_def_id_ in ( select id_ from act_re_procdef pf where pf.key_ in ('preAssessment','preReview') ) group by p.business_key_ ) hp where i.businessid = hp.business_key_ (+) ) ta where 1 = 1 and ta.createby = #{createBy} and ta.pertainareaName like '%${projectUnitName}%' and ta.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and ta.wf_state in (${wf_state})
and ta.apply_date between to_date('${year}/01/01 00:00:00','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date('${year}/12/31 23:59:59','YYYY/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ta.pertainAreaId = #{areaId} and ta.servicetype_id = #{serviceTypeId} and ta.stage in (${stages}) order by ta.create_date desc

select * from ( select t.*, (select o.name from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE=t.pertainareaid) pertainareaName , (select o.NAME from sys_org o where o.ORGPKVALUE = t.reportingunit_id) reportingunitName , (select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.uuid=t.createby) investmentName, (select u.NAME from sys_user u where u.uuid=t.reviewpersonid) reviewpersonName ,
( 'ProjectPreReviewView/'||t.businessid||'@'|| (select a.proc_def_id_ from act_hi_procinst a where a.proc_inst_id_ = hp.procinstid)||'@'||hp.procinstid||'@@' ) oldUrl from (select f.* from rcm_pre_info f where f.wf_state !='0' and f.createby = #{createBy} ) t, (select p.business_key_,MAX(p.proc_inst_id_) procinstid from act_hi_procinst p where p.proc_def_id_ in ( select id_ from act_re_procdef pf where pf.key_ in ('preAssessment','preReview') ) group by p.business_key_ ) hp where t.businessid = hp.business_key_ ) ta where 1 = 1 and ta.createby = #{createBy} and ta.pertainareaName like '%${projectUnitName}%' and ta.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and ta.wf_state = #{wf_state} order by ta.apply_date desc
mapper.update: update rcm_pre_info f set f.wf_state = #{wf_state} where f.businessid = #{businessId}
update rcm_pre_info f set f.stage = #{stage} where f.businessid = #{businessId}
update rcm_pre_info f set f.apply_date = #{apply_date} where f.businessid = #{businessId}
update rcm_pre_info f set f.complete_date = #{completeDate} where f.businessid = #{businessId}
mapper.select: select * from rcm_pre_info f where f.businessid = #{businessId}
mapper.update: update rcm_pre_info f set f.last_update_date = #{last_update_date} where f.businessid = #{businessId}
mapper.insert: insert into rcm_pre_info ( BUSINESSID, PROJECTNAME, PROJECTNUM, REPORTINGUNIT_ID, SERVICETYPE_ID, INVESTMENT_MODEL, PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, NEED_MEETING, MEETING_DATE, IS_SUPPLEMENT_REVIEW, EMERGENCYLEVEL, ISURGENT, PERTAINAREAID, ISTZ, WF_STATE, CREATE_DATE, APPLY_DATE, COMPLETE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, OLDDATA, CREATEBY, STAGE, LARGEAREAPERSONID, SERVICETYPEPERSONID, TASKPERSONID, REVIEWPERSONID, majorMemberIds, fixedgrouppersonids ) values ( #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportingUnit_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investmentModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project_model_ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{need_meeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{meeting_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{is_supplement_review,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pertainAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{istz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wf_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{apply_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{complete_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{last_update_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{oldData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{largeAreaPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTypePersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorMemberIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedGroupPersonIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select count(1) as count from rcm_pre_info

select ta.* from (select p.business_key_, to_char(p.start_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as start_time_, to_char(p.end_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as end_time_, a.key_ as type_, a.name_ as type_text, a.category_ as form_key, p.proc_def_id_, p.proc_inst_id_, decode(p.end_time_, null, (select regexp_replace(listagg(to_char(t.name_), ',') within group(order by t.proc_inst_id_), '([^,]+)(,\1)+', '\1') from act_ru_task t where t.proc_inst_id_ = p.proc_inst_id_), '结束') as phase, (select v.text_ from act_hi_varinst v where v.name_ = 'subject' and v.proc_inst_id_ = p.proc_inst_id_) as subject from act_hi_procinst p, act_re_procdef a where p.proc_def_id_ = a.id_ and exists (select * from act_hi_taskinst t where t.assignee_ = #{userId} and t.proc_inst_id_ = p.proc_inst_id_ and t.end_time_ is not null) and p.business_key_ is not null and a.name_ != 'bulletin' order by p.start_time_ desc) ta where 1 = 1 and proc_def_id_ like '%preAssessment%' and business_key_ = #{businessId}

select i.*, to_char(i.APPLY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') APPLY_DATEA, to_char(i.CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') CREATE_DATEA, to_char(i.COMPLETE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') COMPLETE_DATEA, to_char(i.LAST_UPDATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') LAST_UPDATE_DATEA, to_char(i.APPLY_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') APPLY_DATEA from rcm_project_info i where i.type = 'preAssessment'
select * from rcm_project_relation r where r.business_id = #{businessId}

select t.assignee_ as uuid, u.NAME as userName, o.text_ as opinion, to_char(t.end_time_, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as create_time from (select * from act_hi_varinst h where h.name_ = 'opinion') o, act_hi_taskinst t, sys_user u where o.task_id_ = t.id_ and t.assignee_ = u.UUID and t.task_def_key_ = 'usertask4' and exists (select * from act_hi_procinst a where 1=1 and a.business_key_ = #{businessId} and a.proc_inst_id_ = t.proc_inst_id_) order by t.end_time_ desc
mapper.insert: insert into rcm_pre_info ( BUSINESSID, PROJECTNAME, PROJECTNUM, REPORTINGUNIT_ID, SERVICETYPE_ID, INVESTMENT_MODEL, PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, NEED_MEETING, MEETING_DATE, IS_SUPPLEMENT_REVIEW, EMERGENCYLEVEL, ISURGENT, PERTAINAREAID, ISTZ, WF_STATE, CREATE_DATE, OLDDATA, CREATEBY, STAGE, LARGEAREAPERSONID, SERVICETYPEPERSONID, TASKPERSONID, REVIEWPERSONID, majorMemberIds, fixedgrouppersonids ) values ( #{businessId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportingUnit_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceType_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{investmentModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project_model_ids,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{need_meeting,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{meeting_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'yyyy-mm-dd'), #{is_supplement_review,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emergencyLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isUrgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pertainAreaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '1', #{wf_state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{create_date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{oldData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{largeAreaPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceTypePersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reviewPersonId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{majorMemberIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedGroupPersonIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: select * from rcm_pre_info f where f.PERTAINAREAID is null or PERTAINAREAID = ''
mapper.update: update RCM_PRE_INFO set PERTAINAREAID = #{pertainAreaId} where ID = #{id}
update RCM_PRE_INFO set pigeonhole_Time = #{pigeonholeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},pigeonhole_Status = #{pigeonholeStatus} where businessId = #{businessId}
update RCM_PRE_INFO set pigeonhole_Status = #{pigeonholeStatus} where businessId = #{businessId}
update RCM_PRE_INFO set pigeonhole_Time = #{pigeonholeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},pigeonhole_Status = #{pigeonholeStatus} where businessId = #{businessId}
update rcm_pre_info p set p.metting_commit_time = #{date} where p.businessid = #{businessId}
mapper.select: select p.* from rcm_pre_info p where (p.pigeonhole_status is null or p.pigeonhole_status = '1') and (p.WF_STATE in ('3') or p.stage in('6','9'))
